original_text:
It was you who split open the sea by your power;
    you broke the heads of the monster in the waters.
korean_text: 주께서 주의 능력으로 바다를 나누시고 물 가운데 용들의 머리를 깨뜨리셨으며

sentences.original_text: It was you who split open the sea by your power
sentences.korean_translation: 바다를 당신의 권능으로 갈라놓으신 분은 바로 당신이었습니다

sentences.original_text: you broke the heads of the monster in the waters
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 물속에 있는 괴물의 머리를 부셨습니다
